channel.title: How to change item prices in shops (RuneSource)
channel.description:
So i learned how to add items to the shop, but i can't figure out how to add the prices, i looked in itemdefinitions.xml and found this
<itemDefinition> <id>4587</id> <name>Dragon scimitar</name> <examine>A vicious, curved sword.</examine> <equipmentType>WEAPON</equipmentType> <noted>false</noted> <noteable>true</noteable> <stackable>false</stackable> <parentId>-1</parentId> <notedId>4588</notedId> <members>true</members> <specialStorePrice>200000</specialStorePrice> <generalStorePrice>200000</generalStorePrice> <highAlcValue>60000</highAlcValue> <lowAlcValue>40000</lowAlcValue> <bonus> <int>8</int> <int>67</int> <int>-2</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>1</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>66</int> <int>0</int> </bonus> </itemDefinition>
but even if i change it, it still doesnt change in shop, how do i fix this?

item.title: How to change item prices in shops (RuneSource)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

By what I said, I am saying that you should check where it says in the actual coding where it says “This item is worth “+coins+” coins.” or something like that.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change item prices in shops (RuneSource)

item.title: How to change item prices in shops (RuneSource)
item.dc:creator: @braxton899 braxton899
item.description:
@braxton899 wrote:

runescape sucks:

Find where it tells you how much the item is worth, like when you click value it says something about it.

i did, it was 100,000 in the store, i changed the code above to 200,000 but nothing changed

Read full topic

item.description:
@braxton899 wrote:

So i learned how to add items to the shop, but i can’t figure out how to add the prices, i looked in itemdefinitions.xml and found this

4587 Dragon scimitar A vicious, curved sword. WEAPON false true false -1 4588 true 200000 200000 60000 40000 8 67 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 66 0

but even if i change it, it still doesnt change in shop, how do i fix this?
